content: in this legal case a court in asti issued a final judgment involving several parties the court rejected the requests and exceptions made by the parties and ordered one party referred to as va ga to pay another party referred to as lu ga a monthly sum of €38035 starting from july 22 2013 with legal interest the court also declared that a real estate property received as a donation by va ga should now be owned by lu ga additionally the court assigned different real estate properties to another party referred to as ca gu the court divided various other real estate properties and agricultural lands among the parties involved the court also addressed the exclusive enjoyment of hereditary properties and determined the amount of compensation owed to lu ga the court ordered the division of the estate and allocation of assets based on the parties preferences and waivers furthermore the court calculated an adjustment to be paid by va ga and ordered its payment the court also addressed the costs of the litigation dividing them equally between the parties the final judgment was made on january 27 2023
